articles.title: DPRK to Celebrate 66th Birthday of KCU as Grand Festival
articles.content:
DPRK to Celebrate 66th Birthday of KCU as Grand Festival
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) will be held in Pyongyang with splendor.
					 More than 20,000 delegates to celebrations in Pyongyang were invited to participate in those events under the loving care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Among them are model members of the KCU from all the primary, secondary and branch schools from across the country including remote mountain villages on the northern tip of the DPRK, villages near the Military Demarcation Line and solitary islets.
					
					 The celebrations will take place from June 3 to 8.
					
					 They will tour the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the old home of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae, the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower and other places in Pyongyang and take part in colorful political and cultural events including a concert given by Unhasu Orchestra to mark the occasion, a joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations, a schoolchildren's TV meeting to tell stories related to their ample knowledge, high morality and strong body and a performance of schoolchildren's art groups from across the country.
					
					 They will spend happy and pleasant days at the modern funfair of the Kaeson Youth Park, the Central Zoo, Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant and other places.
					
					 The preparations for marking the occasion as a great auspicious event are now underway under the care of the Party and state and all the people.

articles.title: Greetings to Yemeni President
articles.content:
Greetings to Yemeni President
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Monday sent greetings to Yemeni President Abd Rabbuh Mansur Al Hadi on the National Day of Yemen.
					 Kim, in the message, wished the president success in his work for his country's peace, security, development and prosperity, expressing his belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: KCNA on Shameful Deeds of Japan
articles.content:
KCNA on Shameful Deeds of Japan 
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Japan's politics again became a laughing stock in the U.S. for denying history. 
					 The New York City authorities recently decided to erect a new monument to "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army near Flushing Avenue in the city and name a road there in memory of "comfort women" despite the strong protest of Japan.
					
					 This case took place in the wake of the  incident in which Japan dispatched a delegation of the Liberal Democratic Party to New Jersey and asked its mayor to get the monument to "comfort women" removed, even offering a lot of money, only to experience a hot agony of shame. This sends a clear message to Japan.
					
					 This clearly reflects the international community's opinion and judgment of the Japanese imperialists' indelible crimes against humanity in the past.
					
					 One can still hear the voices of grudge-bearing victims of the monstrous crimes perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists during their military occupation of Korea in the last century and international community's growing voices demanding Japan make reparation for its past crimes.
					
					 As proven by the reality, Japan is still in the dock as far as the human rights abuses are concerned.
					
					 It is quite natural for Japan to draw a due lesson from its past crimes and take a proper attitude and stand on the issues of apology and reparation for them.
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan has become so crazy about denying the sexual slavery that even the Japanese prime minister let loose a spate of balderdash that "the claim 'comfort women' were sexual slaves for the Imperial Japanese Army is quite different from the correct expression."
					
					 Japan is refusing to admit historic facts, far from making apology and reparation for the thrice-cursed crimes by the Japanese imperialists against humanity, just waiting for the days all the direct victims of the sexual slavery and eyewitnesses will die.
					
					 As a proverb says one makes a matter worse, brazen-faced and wicked attitude of the Japanese authorities concerned only adds to Japan's crimes.
					
					 No matter how hard Japan may try, it can never write off its history. The Korean nation will live on as a victim and eyewitness of the Japanese imperialists' crimes.
					
					 Japan calculates that it can write off its crime-woven history with its petty tricks. Herein lie the tragedy of Japan and the reason why the international community despises Japan as a country of political pigmies and cripples.
					
					 Now is the time for Japan to come to its senses as it has long experienced shame, politically and morally drubbed by the international community up to now since the end of the war.

articles.title: KCNA Slams on U.S. Moves to Redeploy Tactical Nuclear Weapons in S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Slams on U.S. Moves to Redeploy Tactical Nuclear Weapons in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. right-wing warlike forces seek to redeploy tactical nuclear weapons in south Korea. 
					 The Armed Services Committee of the House of Representatives of the U.S. passed an amendment to the 2013 national defense authorization act calling for this redeployment. 
					
					 This is an unpardonable action taken by the above-said forces to strain the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension and thus ignite a nuclear war at any cost. 
					
					 The issue of the withdrawal of U.S. tactical nuclear weapons, the leftover of the Cold War, is now under hot debate in various countries and regions including Europe, and this atmosphere prevails in the U.S., too. This being a hard reality, the warlike forces are getting frantic with the redeployment of those weapons contrary to the trend of the situation. This cannot be construed otherwise than a deliberate move to make the situation on the peninsula unstable. 
					
					 As already known, the U.S. has stockpiled more than 1 000 nukes in south Korea. 
					
					 South Korea is now considered as the most threatening nuclear arsenal in the world and the peninsula is fraught with the greatest danger of a nuclear war. 
					
					 If their plan to redeploy those weapons in south Korea is implemented, it will further escalate the tension on the peninsula and the rest of East Asia. 
					
					 The U.S. moves to bolster up the tactical nuclear forces against the DPRK will compel it to take stronger counter-measures against them as it is exposed to constant nuclear threat. 
					
					 They will, at the same time, create nuclear imbalance in all regions of East Asia and spark off a vicious cycle of arms race.  
					
					 It would be hard to imagine the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by the deployment of tactical nuclear weapons on the peninsula where the situation remains tense. 
					
					 It is foolish, indeed, for the right-wing warlike forces to call for the above-said deployment at a time when far-sighted people in the world are urging the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and boldly make a switchover in its strategy. 
					
					 The U.S. warmongers' reckless actions to gain something by sticking to their hostile policy towards the DPRK can never escape rebuff and condemnation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Education in Kim Jong Il's Patriotism Called for
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Education in Kim Jong Il's Patriotism Called for
						
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- An editorial in Rodong Sinmun Monday called upon the Korean people to follow and effect Kim Jong Il's patriotism, an excellent example of patriotism.
					 Only when the education in Kim Jong Il's patriotism is intensified is it possible to prepare all the members of the society to be genuine persons armed with Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism who are loyal to the idea and cause of the leader and work with the patriotic idea and will of Kim Jong Il, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea is set to make the revolutionary advance in another century of the Juche year a general march of loyal soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il by educating the people in his patriotism and model the whole society on Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism. This is the noble intention of the party.
					
					 This is also the essential requirement for glorifying the undying feats of Kim Jong Il and hastening the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 This general march represents a sacred struggle to produce good results by taking good care of the precious seeds which Kim Jong Il sowed all his life for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The victory in building a thriving nation, cherished lifelong desire of Kim Jong Il, can come true soon only when Kim Jong Il's patriotism pervades all the units and fields and all the people render devoted service as he did.
					
					 It is necessary to learn from the firm patriotic faith and will of Kim Jong Il and advance in the staunch fighting spirit of not showing mercy to the provocateurs of our dignity and struggle in the do-or-die spirit. This will guarantee the lasting victory and prosperity of our socialist system.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Inter-Korean Relations Can Never Be Mended with Lee Myung Bak Group in Office
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Inter-Korean Relations Can Never Be Mended with Lee Myung Bak Group in Office
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Nothing can be settled as regards the inter-Korean relations and only confrontation, tension and the danger of a war will be escalated as long as the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is allowed to stay in office, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors drove the inter-Korean relations into such phase that they are no longer repairable and they pushed the  situation on the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase of political and military showdown.
					
					 The group is the first target of elimination as it is escalating the distrust and confrontation between the north and the south and increasing the danger of a nuclear war every hour. 
					
					 As a proverb says a loach may make the water of a river muddy, traitor Lee blinded with the moves for confrontation and war bars the inter-Korean relations and the situation on the peninsula from getting rid of the worst crisis. 
					
					 The improvement of the inter-Korean relations and the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are a fundamental prerequisite to independent reunification, peace and prosperity. This is the unanimous desire of the Korean nation. The prevailing situation calls upon all the compatriots to turn out as one in the struggle to resolutely throw overboard Lee and his group, the root cause of national disasters, in order to improve the inter-Korean relations, achieve peace and reunification and carve out a bright future of the nation.
					
					 The Korean nation can never live in peace even a moment as long as the Lee group of traitors is allowed to go scot-free as it is getting frantic with the moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, utterly indifferent to the destiny of the country and the nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lee Myung Bak's Invectives against DPRK Assailed
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Its Moves to Conclude Military Agreements with Japan
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of south Korea is busy with its moves to conclude military agreements with Japanese reactionaries. The group had already agreed with Japan basically on terms of GSOMIA and Acquisition and Cross-servicing Agreement it wants to sign with Japan. It seeks to ink those agreements during the forthcoming visit of puppet minister of Defence Kim Kwan Jin to Japan.
					 Minju Joson Monday observes this in a by-lined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but a hideous act of treachery aimed at doing harm to the fellow countrymen.
					
					 What matters is that the group of traitors' conclusion of the military agreements with Japan means rounding off the U.S.-led triangular military alliance.
					
					 It is nobody's secret that the U.S. seeks to knock into shape the triangular military alliance in a bid to use it as "NATO of Asian version" while Japanese reactionaries are contemplating realizing their wild ambition to stage a comeback to Korea in collusion with the south Korean puppet forces, backed by the U.S., and the Lee group is working hard to do harm to compatriots, depending on the strength of outside forces. 
					
					 It is as clear as daylight that if the U.S.-Japan-south Korea military alliance appears as a result of the conclusion of the above-said military agreements with Japan, it will further aggravate the situation on the Korean Peninsula, escalate the tension in Asia and put the countries around it under military threat.
					
					 All the Koreans should never remain passive onlookers to the moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, the most despicable quislings serving the U.S. and Japan, to conclude the military agreements with Japan, while offering south Korea as an advanced base for a nuclear war of the U.S. and Japan, doing harm to fellow countrymen and, furthermore, disturbing peace in Asia.
					
					 The rat-like Lee Myung Bak group is bound to meet a miserable end in face of the curse and denunciation by all the Koreans as it is unhesitatingly going to conclude military agreements even with the nation's sworn enemy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Test-firing New Missile
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Test-firing New Missile
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The United States recently test-fired a new type interceptor missile. Its top military officials claimed it was designed to protect its allies from "missile strikes" from the DPRK and Iran.   
					 A bylined commentary of the DPRK major paper Rodong Sinmun on Monday dismisses it as sophism aimed at justifying the criminal intentions to build missile shields and cover up their aggressive nature and danger.
					
					 The U.S. that rounded up the establishment of a missile shield in Europe is set about building missile shields in Northeast Asia and Mideast, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 This proves that the operation of building missile shields is going global.
					
					 In view of the U.S. missile defense system that is aimed to lay a siege to the powers in the Asia-Pacific region from the east and the west, it is no doubt a system for offensive to contain regional powers and hold military hegemony over them.
					
					 The U.S. tries to tire out its "potential rivals" of the region in arms race and hold a military hegemony over them.
					
					 It is an invariable strategic scenario of the U.S. to seize military superiority through the global MD establishment and uni-polarize the world. Herein lies the aggressive nature of its MD moves.
					
					 The U.S. moves clearly show once again who is the arch criminal disturbing the world peace and stability and stirring arms race.
					
					 It is preposterous for the U.S. to seek sinister intentions in charging the DPRK and Iran with posing threats.
					
					 The U.S. should see who its rival is and stop the foolish acts.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses Former U.S. President of His Monstrous War Crimes
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses Former U.S. President of His Monstrous War Crimes
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The War Criminal Tribunal in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, formed a chief justice with its jurists and law experts and held a hearing on torture and war crimes committed by Former U.S. President Bush II and his seven assistants from May 7 to 12.
					 Minju Joson Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: This clearly shows the will of the international community not to pardon those who committed hideous war crimes against humanity no matter how much water has flown under the bridge, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 Still fresh in the memory of world people are the shuddering human rights abuses perpetrated by U.S. troops in Abu Ghraib Prison in Iraq and Guantanamo naval base, shocking the world. 
					
					 These being hard facts, Bush II did not assume any legal responsibility for those hideous crimes against humanity.
					
					 But he is still at large though he earned an ill fame as a hideous war criminal and the U.S., the world's worst human rights abuser and chieftain of genocide, is busy waging "an anti-terror war." This cannot but be a tragedy of the international community.
					
					  Both international law and the UN Charter have no provision stipulating that the U.S. cannot be brought to an international tribunal as it is a "superpower". In the international community each country is equal and the U.S. is just a member of this community. The U.S. deserves a stern punishment if it committed crimes against humankind.
					
					 It will certainly judge on behalf of justice the U.S., the root cause of all the misfortune and sufferings on earth.

articles.title: The DPRK Football Association left for attend the Conference of FIFA
articles.content:
The DPRK Football Association left for attend the Conference of FIFA 
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Football Association led by Vice-Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Kim Jong Su left here for Hungary on Monday to attend the 62nd Conference of FIFA to be held there.
					 Kent Harstedt, lawmaker from Social Democratic Party of Sweden, and his party arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition on Norway's National Day Opens in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition on Norway's National Day Opens in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Photo exhibition "Northern Lights" opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Centre for Cultural Exchange with Foreign Countries on Monday on the national day of Norway. 
					 Present at the ceremony were officials concerned, working people in Pyongyang and members of the visiting delegation of friendship and culture of Norway. 
					
					 Speeches were made. 
					
					 Speakers expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop in the future in accordance with the aspiration of the two peoples, wishing a great success in the photo exhibition.
					
					 The participants looked round photos including those of landscape of Norway.

articles.title: Western Area Experiences Drought in DPRK
articles.content:
Western Area Experiences Drought in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- There has been few rainfalls in the western area of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea since April 26.
					 Most parts of the country, except Ryanggang and Jagang provinces, witnessed a small amount of rainfalls on May 13-14, with no effect on the drought.
					
					Starting from late April, the country experienced the highest daytime temperature. The temperature began to lower a little than an average year from mid-May but has gone up since May 18.
					
					 The high temperature has made the rate of overall soil humidity remain under 65 percent.
					
					 Water level of the country's major irrigation reservoirs stands at 55.4 percent on an average. Water storage in Lake Kumsong in South Phyongan Province dropped even to 0.5 percent, in particular.
					
					 Affected by alternate high and low pressures, rainfalls are believed to be usual in springs in Korea. 
					
					 But, in this spring cold air, which should have come towards the south, continues to stay in the north while the warm and dried air persistently come from continents on middle latitudes, causing a long-time drought in Korea.
					
					 Such an atmospheric phenomenon is said to last until early June only to cause drought.

articles.title: DPRK Woman Boxer Bags Gold Medal
articles.content:
DPRK Woman Boxer Bags Gold Medal 
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK boxer Pak Kyong Ok bagged a gold medal in the 64 kg category at the 7th Women's World Boxing Championships in China on Saturday. 
					 She beat the Australian rival 26:13 in the quarterfinals and the American rival 25:24 in the semifinals. 
					
					 In the finals she trounced the Polish rival 10:5 to be placed first.

articles.title: Slogan Vibrant with Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
articles.content:
Slogan Vibrant with Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The slogan "Let us live not merely for today but for tomorrow!" has swept across the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 It is what leader Kim Jong Il put forth in the period of the Arduous March, in order to implant the revolutionary outlook on life in the minds of all the Korean people.
					
					The slogan reflects the idea that one should devotedly work for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of posterity.
					
					 In the efforts to materialize Kim Jong Il's lifelong desire, the Korean people are holding fast to this slogan, arm in arm and shoulder to shoulder with the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They have been making a bigger stride forward for the final victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, aware of the truth that they are able to enjoy happiness in the near future as they are guided by him.
					
					 The slogan has encouraged the people to register enormous achievements in all fields.
					
					 In a few years, lots of monumental edifices have come into being throughout the country. Typical of them are Huichon Power Station Nos. 1 and 2, the Nampho-Pyongyang seawater pipeline, the Tanchon Port on the eastern coast, and the People's Theater in Pyongyang. The Military Hardware Exhibition House of the Korean People's Army was built in Pyongyang, as a representation of the nation's powerful defence capabilities. 
					
					 The country will soon witness the completion of the projects for high-rise apartment buildings in Mansudae area, Rungna Pleasure Ground, Pyongyang Folk Park and greenhouses of the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute and the Pyongyang Floriculture Institute and renovation of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education.
					
					 Meanwhile, newly-built Mansugyo Meat and Fish Shop, Sinhung Restaurant and Kangsong Health Complex have been contributing to bettering the wellbeing of the people's livelihood.

articles.title: Banks of Pothong River Take on Fresh Looks
articles.content:
Banks of Pothong River Take on Fresh Looks
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The scenery of Pothong River in the capital city of Pyongyang has become more conspicuous, with the building of the Mansugyo Meat and Fish Shop in April this year.
					 Before Korea's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, the huts-riddled Pothong River area was flooded in rainy seasons.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung initiated the Pothong River improvement project and broke the ground for it to signal the start of the nation's grand nature-remaking project on May 21, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 Since then, the Pothong River area has begun its life.
					
					 The riverside was turned into a pleasure park and many streets and monumental edifices were built alongside it. They include Rakwon, Pulgun and Chollima streets, People's Palace of Culture, Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, Chongnyu Restaurant, Ice Rink and Changgwang Health Complex.
					
					They are illustrative of Kim Il Sung's idea of believing in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 The riverside was face-lifted under the deep care of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					Mansudae Street, Pothonggang Shop, Pothonggang Department Store, Meat and Fish Shop in Pothongmun Street and Mansugyo Meat and Fish Shop, built in a peculiar style in recent years, go well in harmony with already-existing edifices on the banks of the river.
					
					 All of them are results of the efforts Kim Jong Il made for the wellbeing of the people all his life, as well as the dear respected Kim Jong Un's loving care for them.

articles.title: 15th Pyongyang Spring Int'l Trade Fair Largest Ever in Its History
articles.content:
15th Pyongyang Spring Int'l Trade Fair Largest Ever in Its History
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The 15th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair showcased the will of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to further international economic exchange and cooperation.
					 Attended by some 270 companies from various countries and regions, including the DPRK, China and Germany, the fair put on display more than 2,100 kinds of products in various economic fields.
					
					 Kim Mun Jong, director of the Korean International Exhibition Corporation, told KCNA:
					
					 "The Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair exhibits up-to-date technologies and products in industrial and agricultural and light industrial fields.
					
					 The fair, which is held in Pyongyang in springs and autumns, has developed year on year in its scale and quality.
					
					 This current fair boasted of hundreds of standardized compartments on the first and second floors, along with open-air displays. Attractions were CNC-based machine tools, electric and electronic apparatuses, vehicular units, petrol-chemical products, medicines, daily necessities and foodstuffs.
					
					 Arrangements of exhibits took on new looks and trade counsels had got momentum.
					
					 Many businessmen from Asia and Europe expressed their willingness to invigorate economic and trade dealings with the DPRK."

articles.title: Magnetic Needle for Medical Treatment Developed
articles.content:
Magnetic Needle for Medical Treatment Developed
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The magnetic needle, developed by the New Material Development Centre under Kim Chaek University of Technology, has been highly appreciated by users.
					 Vice-Director of the Centre An Pyong Chol told KCNA:
					
					 "The apparatus works to give far infrared rays and anion, radiated by natural substances, to human body and activate organic current by dint of magnetic power. 
					
					 The rare-earth magnet is a permanent one widely used in human body treatment. There is no electromagnetic wave harmful to human body as it doesn't need any use of electric and electronic elements. With power unnecessary, its use is not subject to times and places."
					
					 An Kyong Hui, chief of the Koryo Medicine Department of Pyongyang Medical College under Kim Il Sung University, said:
					
					 "Generally, acupuncture irritates body. But, the magnetic needle is used only to touch any painful region on the user's own hand.
					
					 It is efficacious for treatment and prevention of cardiovascular disease, autonomic imbalance, facioplegia and other internal organic diseases.
					
					 It has no side-effect and can be used for a long period, especially for the body organs unfit for acupuncture.
					
					 Kang Nam, a 55-year-old man living in Sosong District, Pyongyang, who suffered from arteriosclerosis, said:
					
					 "It is so mysterious. My illness has got much better with the use of the needle."

articles.title: Brisk Preparations for Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Brisk Preparations for Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu 
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Preparations are making brisk headway for the summer study tour of revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					 Officials and other employees of the Management Bureau of the Revolutionary Battle Sites in Ryanggang Province have taken measures to prevent the damage by heat and humidity, while face-lifting those sites as centers for the education in the revolutionary traditions.
					
					 The officials and other employees of the Management Stations of Mt. Paektu, Mubong and Chongbong Revolutionary Battle Sites have carried out the work for permanently preserving the trees bearing revolutionary slogans, valuable treasures of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Roads for study tour extending hundreds of kilometers have been improved and buses for tour are ready to run.
					
					 The cable car management station in the above-said sites has finished arranging ground cable car roadbeds from Paektu Station to Hyangdo Station and maintaining passenger cars. They have, at the same time, solved technical issues arising in the operation of aerial cable cars, providing full safety in it.
					
					 The repair of stone stairways to Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu is close to completion.
					
					 Public establishments and cultural and welfare facilities including bedrooms, dinning rooms and wash-cum-bath houses at all lodging quarters for campers have been renovated. Every measure has been taken to provide the best convenience of the study tour makers.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of Finnish National Committee for Study of Juche Idea Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of Finnish National Committee for Study of Juche Idea Held
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea was held in Helsinki on May 9.
					 On display at its venue were photos of the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and books and photos of the proud achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK in building a thriving nation.
					
					 It reviewed last year's work and discussed this year's action program. It reelected Juha Kieksy as chairman of the committee.

articles.title: Impressions of Visit to DPRK Posted on Internet Website of Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Impressions of Visit to DPRK Posted on Internet Website of Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea on May 9 posted on its Internet website a travelogue on its delegation's visit to the DPRK under the title "Prospering DPRK".
					 The delegation visited the DPRK and attended the World Conference on the Juche Idea for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, the travelogue said, and went on:
					
					 We can not repress admiration at Pyongyang that has undergone change beyond recognition in a matter of just one year. We had an honor of directly hearing the speech by Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, at the venue of the military parade for celebrating the centenary of the birth of the President.
					
					 In the DPRK broad popular masses including workers and farmers are enjoying democratic freedom and right to their heart's content.
					
					 The imperialists are malignantly slandering the DPRK but it is a democratic and independent socialist country. It is developing the friendly and cooperative relations with different countries on the principle of independence, mutual respect and reciprocity. 
					
					 The President founded the Juche-based revolutionary armed forces, achieved the historic cause of the liberation of Korea and beat back the armed invasion by the imperialist allied forces. He also shattered all the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group for igniting a new war and provided a military guarantee for defending the country's sovereignty and building socialism.
					
					 General secretary Kim Jong Il firmly defended socialism under the uplifted banner of Songun and wisely led the army and people of the DPRK to build a thriving nation.
					
					 Referring to the struggle of the Korean people to reunify the country, the travelogue expressed full support and solidarity with it.

articles.title: Works Carried by Indonesian Paper
articles.content:
Works Carried by Indonesian Paper
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The Indian paper New Delhi Times on May 16 carried the gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation".
					 The work, published on April 27, 2012, deals with the undying feats President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il performed in land management and indicates the general orientation and tasks for face-lifting the land as befitting the land of a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism also posted the work on its Internet website on May 14.
					
					 The Young Communist League of Russia on May 12 posted on its Internet website the detailed gist of Kim Jong Un's work "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun".
					
					 The work, published on April 15, 2012, says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation was a history that clearly proved the truth that the dignity and prosperity of a country and nation are guaranteed only when it is led by prominent leaders. 
					
					 Clarified in the work is an idea that the Korean People's Army which registered one victory after another has guaranteed the 100-year history of Juche Korea and this provides a sure guarantee for the eternal history of Kim Il Sung's nation, Kim Jong Il's Korea. 
					
					 The work also sets forth the tasks for exalting the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully accomplishing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation, etc.

articles.title: Jordan FM Says Creation of Palestinian State Top National Interest
articles.content:
Jordan FM Says Creation of Palestinian State Top National Interest
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Jordanian Foreign Minister Nasser Judeh said Thursday that the creation of an independent and viable Palestinian state is of top interest to Jordan, the state-run Petra news agency reported.
					 At a meeting with Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas, the Jordanian minister stressed that Jordan is directly concerned about the final status issues of Palestinians, including the issues of refugees, water security and Jerusalem.
					
					 The minister added that Jordan will continue to exert efforts to enable the creation of an independent Palestinian state within the borders of 1967 with east Jerusalem as its capital based on the Arab peace initiative and the international resolutions.

articles.title: Different Countries to Strengthen Mutual Cooperation
articles.content:
Different Countries to Strengthen Mutual Cooperation
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Nigeria and Mauritius signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) to strengthen bilateral security cooperation, the government said on Wednesday.
					 Belarus and Kazakhstan signed eight official documents on cooperating in fields of agriculture, food safety, gas and so on.

articles.title: 5 Palestinians Wounded in Israeli Fire in Gaza
articles.content:
5 Palestinians Wounded in Israeli Fire in Gaza
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Five Palestinians were wounded Thursday during artillery shelling and shooting that accompanied an Israeli army incursion in the Gaza Strip, witnesses and medical sources said.
					 Three youths and an old man were wounded when Israeli tanks fired three shells near the border in eastern Gaza City, the witnesses said.

articles.title: RPDC conmemorara con solemnidad el aniversario 66 de la UNC
articles.content:
RPDC conmemorara con solemnidad el aniversario 66 de la UNC 
 Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar con solemnidad en esta capital el acto en homenaje al aniversario 66 de la fundacion de la Union de Ninos de Corea (UNC).
					 Gracias a la benevolencia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, fueron invitados a Pyongyang mas de 20 mil delegados incluyendo a los ejemplares integrantes de la UNC seleccionados en todas las escuelas primarias y secundarias y las anexas del pais situadas en las montanas remotas de la zona septentrional, las aldeas de zonas aledanas a la linea de demarcacion e islas solitarias.
					
					 Se efectuaran los actos festivos del 3 al 8 de junio.
					
					 Durante ese periodo, los delegados visitaran la Plaza del Palacio del Sol de Kumsusan, la casa natal del Presidente Kim Il Sung en Mangyongdae, el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios del Monte Taesong, el Monumento a la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y otros lugares de la capital, presenciaran el concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu dedicado a dicha efemeride y participaran en el acto nacional de las organizaciones de la UNC, la escena TV de ninos escolares dotados de ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y buena salud, la funcion nacional de los miembros de grupos artisticos de ninos escolares y otras actividades politicas y culturales.
					
					 Tambien ellos pasaran los dias alegres en el Parque de Atracciones Juventud de Kaeson, el Parque Zoologico Nacional, el Restaurante Okryu, el Chongryu y otros lugares.
					
					 Se impulsan activamente bajo la atencion del partido, el Estado y todo el pueblo los preparativos para garantizar con exito tales actividades festivas.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim averigua en el terreno los institutos capitalinos
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim averigua en el terreno los institutos capitalinos
 Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- El premier Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, averiguo el dia 20 en el terreno la obra de ensanche de capacidades del invernadero de cultivo acuatico del Instituto de Ciencia de Verduras de Pyongyang y el invernadero del Instituto de Plantas Decorativas de Pyongyang.
					 Se promueve energicamente en la etapa final gracias al elevado entusiasmo revolucionario de los constructores la construccion de los edificios que se levantan bajo la iniciativa directa del Dirigente  Kim Jong Il quien dedico todo lo suyo hasta el ultimo momento de su vida para ofrecer la condicion de vida civilizada y rica a los pueblos y la profunda atencion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Tras averiguar el estado de la construccion de los invernaderos, Choe cercioro detalladamente del estado de produccion y suministro de verduras recorriendo el invernadero de cultivo acuatico donde estan impregnadas las sagradas huellas de direccion del Dirigente y el Maximo Dirigente.
					
					 Destaco la necesidad de terminar rapidamente segun la demanda de metodo constructivo la construccion de invernadero, que se contribuira activamente al mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo, y tomo medidas para solucionar los problemas que se presentan en la obra.
					
					 Este dia, Choe subrayo la necesidad de mantener estrictamente los principios historicistas en la construccion recorriendo el Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang en etapa final.

articles.title: ACNC condena conducta de Japon
articles.content:
ACNC condena conducta de Japon
 Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- La politica de Japon que niega la historia sigue sufriendo la verguenza en Estados Unidos.
					  A pesar de la fuerte oposicion de Japon, las autoridades de la ciudad de Nueva York decidieron  levantar nuevamente en alrededor de Flushing de la ciudad el monumento a recordacion a las ex consoladoras para el viejo ejercito japones y denominar una avenida de Flushing como la de recordacion a las ex consoladoras.
					
					  Hace unos dias, se avergonzo la delegacion del Partido Democratico Liberal enviada por Japon al Estado de New Jersey para demandar la retirada de este monumento agitando una bolsa de inmensa cantidad de dinero.
					
					  El hecho refleja claramente la opinion publica y sentencia de la sociedad internacional sobre el imborrable crimen antietico del imperialismo japones.
					
					  Las victimas que sufren hasta fecha por el crimen cometido por el imperialismo japones durante la ocupacion militar en Corea lo condenan categoricamente y en la escena internacional se alza mas que nunca la voz de demanda de la liquidacion de  su crimen pasado.
					
					  Como demuestra la realidad, Japon esta sentado en el banquillo de acusado en cuanto al problema de derechos humanos. 
					
					 Por lo tanto, Japon debe sacar la leccion merecida por el respecto y tomar la actitud y postura justas en pedir disculpas e indemnizar por sus crimenes del pasado.
					
					 Sin embargo, Japon esta negandolo a toda costa presentando hasta a su premier quien dijo: "es erronea la expresion de que las consoladoras fueran esclavas sexuales".
					
					 Al esperar hasta que mueren las victimas directas y sus testigos, evita siquiera el reconocimiento de los hechos historicos en vez de pedir disculpa y liquidar por los crimenes de lesa humanidad cometidos en el pasado.
					
					 Esta actitud tan cinica y maligna de las autoridades japoneses solo agrandara sus crimenes.
					
					 La historia no desaparece nunca aunque uno intente borrarla. Estara siempre viva junto con la historia la nacion coreana, victima y reveladora de los crimenes cometidos por el imperialismo japones.
					
					 Japon piensa que podria borrar la historia de crimenes con sus artimanas miserables, he aqui su tragedia y la razon por la cual en la sociedad internacional se considera como un pais enano y deformado en lo politico.
					
					 Japon, que se ha avergonzado siempre por la sociedad internacional en lo politico y moral, debera despertarse merecidamente.

articles.title: ACNC comenta reubicacion de armas nucleares tacticas en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC comenta reubicacion de armas nucleares tacticas en Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- Las fuerzas belicistas derechistas de EE.UU. persiguen la reubicacion de armas nucleares tacticas en suelo surcoreano.
					 El comite militar de la camara de representantes de ese pais dio luz verde al proyecto de enmienda de la ley de autorizacion de defensa nacional de 2013 que urge eso.
					
					 Esta conducta imperdonable significa que los belicistas derechistas de EE.UU. quieren desatar a toda costa la guerra nuclear al llevar al extremo la ya tensa situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Ultimamente, en Europa y varios paises y regiones se reclama fuertemente la retirada de armas nucleares tacticas y esta tendencia se extiende hasta al territorio estadounidense.
					
					 Actualmente, se totaliza en mas de un millar el numero de armas nucleares desplegadas en territorio surcoreano.
					
					 El Sur de Corea es conocido como arsenal nuclear mas peligroso del mundo y la Peninsula Coreana corre mas riesgo de guerra nuclear que otras regiones.
					
					 Una vez desplegadas en Sur de Corea las armas nucleares tacticas, la Peninsula Coreana y Asia Oriental afrontaran una situacion mucho mas tensa y peligrosa que la de ahora.
					
					 Sobre todo, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sometida constantemente a la amenaza nuclear, se vera obligada a procurar la capacidad de enfrentarse a esos nuevos artefactos.
					
					 Por consiguiente, toda la region de Asia Oriental caera en el desequilibro de fuerzas nucleares y el circulo vicioso de carrera armamentista.
					
					 Por eso, los hombres clarividentes del mundo opinan que lo que necesita realmente es la cancelacion de la politica hostil a Corea mantenida hasta ahora por EE.UU. y el cambio de su estrategia actual.
					
					 Sera repudiado sin falta el acto extremista de los belicistas norteamericanos que pretenden sacar algun provecho de su politica hostil a Corea.
